description: React component 'NotesList' renders a list of notes or an empty state if no notes are present. It manages display logic, including count and delete confirmation.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, onEditNote, onDeleteNote })
methods.description: Functional component rendering notes or empty state, with handlers for editing and deletion.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a note after user confirmation.
